activities: We store and process employee personal information for one or more of the following purposes:  workflow management, such as assigning, managing, administering and allocating costs for projects; compensation related activities, including benefit plan administration and compensation analysis; job grading activities; performance management, including training data; benefits and personnel administration, including administration of health and medical benefits and leave entitlements; providing IT support; intellectual property management; and reviewing auditing and enforcing compliance with company policies and procedures.
industrysector: General Industrial Eqpt & Supplies - (GIE)Comm Vessels & Eqpt (EXCL FISH) - (CVR)Pleasure Boats & Accessories - (PLB)
personaldata: Human Resource data. The data does not include manually processed data.
